title: The Homicide story
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television broadcasting

Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television - Production and direction
description: The story of the making of one episode of the successful Australian television series - Homicide. From the idea for a story in the mind of a writer to the finished product - a matter of fourteen weeks intensive planning and work. We follow all steps of production: from the writing of the script to the final telerecording of thirty minutes of television.
